title: Data Preprocessing with R
text: This is the first post, I had written this by Quarto. Pre-processing is quitely an art for me; me and some of my friends has decided to write it in R-markdown, this is a mini version that recap the technique to pre-processing data with the help of R. Here is the link to read it!

title: Hiep Tat Bui
text: Hi, I am Hiep, I have extensive background working with varied data sets and using advanced analytics to make informed decisions, I also like to deal with data visualization, machine learning and dive in deep learning with Natural Language Processing field, especially in integrate between Large Language Model and Knowledge Graph.  I like to working in R and Python. Recently, I expanded my skill set include topics like Quarto. My aiming object is to become knowing various technique in Data Science.
